com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.utils

Class RandomCollection<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.utils.RandomCollection<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - - The type of object to be stored in the Collection

    public class RandomCollection<E>
extends java.lang.Object
    An implementation of a Collection based on a TreeMap. The goal of the RandomCollection is to simplify the process of retrieving a random object based on its mapped weight

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RandomCollection()
      Construct a new RandomCollection with a new Random object
      RandomCollection(java.util.Random random)
      Construct a new RandomCollection with a given Random object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean add(double weight, E result)
      Add a new object to the collection with a given weighted random
      void addAll(RandomCollection<E> collection)
      Add all elements of another RandomCollection
      void clear()
      Clear all data from the random collection
      E next()
      Retrieve the next object, being a random object in the collection based on its weighted value
      java.util.Collection<E> values()
      Get a Collection of all values in the underlying TreeMap

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(double weight,
                   E result)
        Add a new object to the collection with a given weighted random
        Parameters:
        weight - the weight of the object
        result - the object to add
        Returns:
        true if successfully added, false if an invalid weight was provided

      • addAll

        public void addAll(RandomCollection<E> collection)
        Add all elements of another RandomCollection
        Parameters:

        Get a Collection of all values in the underlying TreeMap
        Returns:
        get all values in the collection

      • next

        public E next()
        Retrieve the next object, being a random object in the collection based on its weighted value
        Returns:
